definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: Pick up the receive and drop a coin into the slot.
sentences.chinese: 拿起電話筒，然後投一枚硬幣到投幣孔裏去。

sentences.english: Rick chinned the helmet stud again and told Bela to make it quick.
sentences.chinese: 瑞克連通頭盔話筒，告訴貝拉動作要快。

sentences.english: He said as he gave the microphone to Julia.
He spoke into the phone, "How about the buses with the adults?"
sentences.chinese: 他對着電話筒講到，“載有大人們的麪包車呢？”

sentences.english: Samuel holds the phone to his ear till the dial tone goes busy.
sentences.chinese: 塞繆爾僵硬的握着話筒，直到對面傳來嘟嘟的忙音。

sentences.english: Let's go back to our Internet reporter Abbi Tatton.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們將話筒交給互聯網記者艾比。

sentences.english: Both Mr Watt and Mr Knott were angry and put their telephones down.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生和諾德先生都怒氣衝衝地撂下話筒。

sentences.english: The captain's voice blared in the tube.
Don't forget to put back the receiver when you've finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 講完後別忘記把電話筒放回原處。

sentences.english: The mike resembled an old-fashioned gramophone horn.
sentences.chinese: 話筒看起來很像老式留聲機的喇叭。

sentences.english: I leaned the microphone up against Raylou's groundhog kiln.
sentences.chinese: 我把話筒靠在蕾露的地窯上。

sentences.english: If you are using a microphone, make sure it works.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要用話筒，一定要確保它好用。

sentences.english: Please widdershins turn the transmitter and the line of the volume potentiometer to the end before use.
sentences.chinese: 使用前將話筒及線路音量電位器逆時針轉到底。

sentences.english: Bird-brilliant! He picked up the phone once more and wagged his tail bravely at Maude.
sentences.chinese: 他重新咬起話筒，衝着莫德勇敢地搖着尾巴。

sentences.english: Whenever you make a phone call smil when you pick up the phone.
sentences.chinese: 無論什麼時候打電話，摘起話筒的時候請微笑。

definition: to interrupt/to break off/to break (a bone)
unceasing torrent (idiom)/talking non-stop/gabbling forty to the dozen
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
